level_select_title: Help us get you the right lessons

level_select.level_detail: I can give basic information about my personal life and my school to work.
level_select.level_example: "I'm an engineer. I work in a big company. I live in Asia."

level_select.level_detail: I can talk about my background and about my hopes and plans for the future.
level_select.level_example: "I worked in the UK for five years. I'm planning to move to China next year."

level_select.level_detail: I can deal with most transactions that arise in daily life and traveling.
level_select.level_example: "I'd like to make a reservation to fly to Los Angeles on the 5th. I'll be returning on October 15th."

level_select.level_detail: I can exchange complex information about my personal and work life.
level_select.level_example: "Before going back for my MBA, I had been working in an internet company for five years."

level_select.level_detail: I can use language flexibly and effectively - including emotional, nuanced and joking usage - even when people are speaking quickly.
level_select.level_example: "In my opinion, homelessness is the most critical issue facing society. We have to develop effective policies for reintegrating homeless people into mainstream society."

purpose_select_title: Do you want to travel or study?

purpose_selections.text: 为了工作我需要学英语,但我也想出国旅游。
我专注在学英语上,这和我的工作有直接关系。
我喜欢旅游,工作原因我也要学点英语。
我太爱旅游了,我想去世界各地走走。
